ErrorCode.name: BadTypeFormat
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Type format does not match with the expected

ErrorCode.name: ConversionError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Error reported during conversion of one or more arguments

ErrorCode.name: SyntaxError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Command does not reflect the expected grammar

ErrorCode.name: TooManyParameters
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The function does not requires so many parameters

ErrorCode.name: SystemCommandError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: System command could not be executed

Member.name: SystemCommand
Member.description: The command that caused the error

ErrorCode.name: RemoteCommandError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Remote command could not be completed

Member.name: RemoteCommandMessage
Member.description: The error message associated to the error

Member.name: Command
Member.description: The command that caused the error

ErrorCode.name: PackageError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: No route to package entry point

ErrorCode.name: NotSupportedError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: The requested feature is not supported

ErrorCode.name: TimeFormatError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Cannot recognized the format of the timestamp

ErrorCode.name: ParserTimerError
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Impossible to setup the timer with given timestamp
